application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Two storey rear and single storey side extension; rear roof extension with two pitched dormers; installation of seven skylights to side and rear roofslopes, three additional windows to side elevations; conversion of integral garage into a habitable space; alteration of front elevation incorporating installation of a window in lieu of a garage door and side access door; window replacement with double glazed units to match existing; removal of existing chimney stack; and installation of heat pump and AHU on flat roof section of side extension
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 251/00_002 (Existing Site Block Plan), 251/00_006 (Existing Plans), 251/00_010 (Existing Elevations), 251/00_012 (Existing Sections), 251/00_014 (Proposed Site Block Plan), 251/00_015 (Proposed Ground Plan), 251/00_016 (Proposed First Plan), 251/00_017 (Proposed Second  Plan), 251/00_017 (Proposed Roof Plan), 251/00_020 (Proposed Elevations), 251/00_022 (Proposed Sections), 251/00_023 (Car Parking Provision), Design & Access & Heritage Statement, received 01.12.2022.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
